CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property;Violation of Article 13 - Right to an effective remedy
JUDGES: Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mykhaylo Buromenskiy;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in PERSON .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was dismissed from his job at the ORG enterprise ( PERSON сільське комунальне господарство « PERSON ) , a subsidiary of the municipal entity Oblsilkomungosp ( GPE обласне виробничо-кооперативне об'єднання сільського комунального господарства « Облсількомунгосп PERSON ) .
CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicant challenged his dismissal and sought compensation before ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court allowed the applicant 's reinstatement claim and ordered Oblsilkomungosp to pay him CARDINAL NORP hryvnias ( ORG ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG instituted enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld that judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG enterprise was formally reorganised into a private company , NORP

CARDINAL . On several occasions the enforcement proceedings were discontinued for various reasons and reopened following complaints by the applicant that these decisions were unfair . It is unclear from the parties ' submissions whether the debt under the judgment was paid .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the debtor entity was fined for failure to enforce the judgment of DATE . Additionally , ORG requested the local prosecutor to institute criminal proceedings against the managers of Oblsilkomungosp , which request was subsequently rejected .
CARDINAL . On DATE a decision was taken to initiate liquidation of Oblsilkomungosp .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG returned the enforcement writ to the applicant unenforced .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG instituted insolvency proceedings against Oblsilkomungosp and on DATE declared the company insolvent .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG further approved the liquidation balance sheet and declared Oblsilkomungosp liquidated , following which declaration on DATE the company was deleted from ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in LOC against Oblsilkomungosp , seeking compensation on account of its prolonged failure to reinstate him .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court , finding that the judgment of CARDINAL DATE in the part concerning reinstatement had still not been enforced , awarded the applicant ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of Appeal increased this sum to ORG CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date ORG instituted enforcement proceedings . On DATE ORG terminated the enforcement proceedings as the debtor had been liquidated .
CARDINAL . The judgment of CARDINAL DATE , as amended by the judgment of DATE , remains largely unenforced .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in the NORP ORG against Oblsilkomungosp , seeking compensation for its failure to reinstate him after DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the court , finding that the judgment of CARDINAL DATE in the part concerning reinstatement had still not been enforced , allowed his claim and awarded the applicant ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL . The court also found that the applicant had resigned on DATE as a result of his employer 's liquidation and ordered the liquidation commission to prepare documents for the applicant 's pension .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of Appeal quashed that judgment in the part concerning the applicant 's resignation and the liquidation commission 's obligation to prepare documents for the applicant 's pension and gave a new judgment dismissing these claims . The court further upheld the remainder of the judgment .
CARDINAL . The judgment at issue remains unenforced .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in the NORP ORG against the local department of justice and CARDINAL local departments of ORG , seeking compensation for non - pecuniary damage incurred as a result of the lengthy non - enforcement of the judgment of CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . In a judgment of DATE the court ordered the defendants jointly to pay the applicant the total amount of ORG CARDINAL .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of Appeal quashed that judgment in the part concerning the obligation of the local department of justice to pay the applicant compensation and rendered a new one dismissing this claim and reducing thereby the amount awarded to ORG CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date ORG instituted enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE it returned the writs of enforcement to the applicant owing to the debtors ' lack of funds .
CARDINAL . On DATE the NORP ORG amended its previous judgment , awarding the applicant an additional amount of ORG DATE in court fees .
CARDINAL . The judgment of DATE as amended , remains unenforced .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in the FAC against Y. and PERSON , the manager and his deputy , of Oblsilkomungosp , seeking compensation for non - pecuniary damage incurred as a result of the lengthy non - enforcement of the judgment of CARDINAL DATE . In a final decision of DATE ORG dismissed his claim . Later , the applicant requested the courts to review the impugned judgment under the extraordinary procedure , but in vain .

CARDINAL . The applicant also requested a local prosecutor to institute criminal proceedings against the above - mentioned persons . However , on DATE the prosecutor found no prima facie case for instituting the proceedings as requested . The applicant appealed against that decision but in a final decision of DATE ORG of GPE dismissed his appeal . Subsequently , the applicant requested the courts to review the impugned decision under the extraordinary procedure , but to no avail .

CARDINAL . The applicant further claimed compensation from the local prosecutor 's office for its failure to enforce the judgment of CARDINAL DATE . On DATE the ORG found against the applicant . On DATE ORG upheld that judgment .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in ORG against Oblsilkomungosp and the local ORG , seeking to have the reorganisation of PERSON declared void . On DATE the court dismissed his claim . On DATE ORG upheld that judgment . Subsequently , the applicant requested the courts to review the impugned judgment under the extraordinary procedure , but to no avail .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in LOC against Oblsilkomungosp , seeking the annulment of the reinstatement orders of DATE and CARDINAL DATE . On DATE the court dismissed his claim . On DATE ORG upheld that judgment . Later , the applicant unsuccessfully requested the courts on several occasions to review the impugned judgment under the extraordinary procedure .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the applicant instituted proceedings in LOC against the local department of justice , seeking compensation for non - pecuniary damage incurred as a result of the lengthy non - enforcement of the judgment of DATE . In a judgment of CARDINAL DATE his claim was dismissed . The applicant did not appeal against that judgment .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the applicant instituted proceedings in ORG of GPE against ORG and its President . On DATE the court dismissed his claim , stating that it should have been lodged with a relevant district court .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in the GPE ORG against Oblsilkomungosp and other persons , seeking , inter alia , to have the judgment of CARDINAL DATE reviewed under the extraordinary procedure . It appears that the proceedings are still pending before that court .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of PERSON v. GPE , ( no . CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL , CARDINAL DATE ) .
